text: Sean Robert Wharton (born 31 October 1968) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Newport, Wales Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Cwmbrân Town A.F.C. players Category:Inter Cardiff F.C. players Category:Weston-super-Mare A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Sean Wharton
